amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 117-15 to revise the bill to provide a safe harbor for employers who conduct self-audits to identify and rectify potentially unlawful pay disparities and allows for reasonable employer defenses against trial lawyer abuses.
